deletescalingpolicy.name: DeleteScalingPolicy
deletescalingpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a scaling policy

deletescheduledaction.name: DeleteScheduledAction
deletescheduledaction.description: Grants permission to delete a scheduled action

deregisterscalabletarget.name: DeregisterScalableTarget
deregisterscalabletarget.description: Grants permission to deregister a scalable target

describescalabletargets.name: DescribeScalableTargets
describescalabletargets.description: Grants permission to describe one or more scalable targets in the specified namespace

describescalingactivities.name: DescribeScalingActivities
describescalingactivities.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scaling activities or all scaling activities in the specified namespace

describescalingpolicies.name: DescribeScalingPolicies
describescalingpolicies.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scaling policies or all scaling policies in the specified namespace

describescheduledactions.name: DescribeScheduledActions
describescheduledactions.description: Grants permission to describe a set of scheduled actions or all scheduled actions in the specified namespace

getpredictivescalingforecast.name: GetPredictiveScalingForecast
getpredictivescalingforecast.description: Grants permission to retrieve the forecast data for a predictive scaling policy

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a scalable target

putscalingpolicy.name: PutScalingPolicy
putscalingpolicy.description: Grants permission to create and update a scaling policy for a scalable target

putscheduledaction.name: PutScheduledAction
putscheduledaction.description: Grants permission to create and update a scheduled action for a scalable target

registerscalabletarget.name: RegisterScalableTarget
registerscalabletarget.description: Grants permission to register AWS or custom resources as scalable targets with Application Auto Scaling and to update configuration parameters used to manage a scalable target

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a scalable target

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a scalable target
